hero.title: Welcome 👋
hero.description: A place for your community's Knowledge, Ideas and Inspiration.

features.title: Features
features.description: Everything you need to support your communities.

highlights.1: Curate content relevant for your community
highlights.2: Organize, tag and link curated content to create valuable Knowledge Graphs
highlights.3: Share and/or monetize your curated content

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: We offer a plan for every need. You can start with the free plan and upgrade whenever you need more features.

ultimate.name: Ultimate
ultimate.description: The ultimate bundle for your business

userSubscriptionAlert.title: Your subscription
userSubscriptionAlert.text: Hey { userName }! You are currently subscribed to the { planName } plan. To manage your subscription or upgrade your plan, click the button below.

internalServerErrorPage.title: Doh...
internalServerErrorPage.message: We seem to have a problem to solve...

updateUserName.errorMessage: Your name could not be updated. Please try again.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.currentlySubscribed: You are currently subscribed to the following plan:
subscription.notSubscribed: You are not currently subscribed to a plan.

blogPage.title: Blog
blogPage.description: Read the latest stories from our team!

signupForm.title: Create an account
signupForm.description: Enter your information to create a new account.
signupForm.successMessage: Your account has been created. Please check your email to confirm your account.
signupForm.errorMessage: An error occurred while trying to create your account. Please try again.

username.tooLong: The username can be at most {length} characters long
username.forbiddenCharacters: Special characters are forbidden for usernames

signinForm.title: Sign in
signinForm.description: Welcome back to Knowii. Enter your credentials to sign in.
signinForm.linkSent: The magic link was sent. Please check your inbox to continue.
signinForm.errorMessage: Seems like something went wrong. Please check your credentials and try again.

resetPasswordForm.title: Reset your password
resetPasswordForm.errorMessage: An error occurred while trying to reset your password. Please try again.

forgotPasswordForm.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPasswordForm.linkSent: Link sent. Please check your inbox.
forgotPasswordForm.errorMessage: We could not send you a link to reset your password. Please make sure, you entered the correct email and try again.
